page.title: 10Landscape & Build.-Ide Hill
page.content: {Henden Manor Farmhouse} Wiiliam Moraunt held his manorial court at this place in 1325. The existing farmhouse dates from the 16th.C and has a water-filled moat. Extensive restoration work was carried out on the recent change of ownership in 1978/9. The main roof beam was found to be badly damaged by fire, in one part being reduced from twelve inches square to about three inches in diameter. Internally there are exposed beams and late 16th.C wainscoting in two of the rooms. The dining-room has panels carved with initials and the date 1577.
